item.description:
Hey fellow Boston Volunteers,

 

Several of you helped us create an IndieGoGo/Kickstarter campaign to support our 
Doggy Fun Run/Walk. Thank you.

Please learn more about:

1. What we stand for

2. How you can help

3. What percent of the fundraising is going where

 

Special thank you to Phani, AJ, and the Doggy Fun Run team. 
This project is going to cost a lot of money (we've already invested a lot).

Learn more about: What percent of the fundraising is going where

 

Can you help? Every penny helps.

What do you think about your film?

Please help us reach our goal (what's our goal/how close are we).

Thank you in advance, :)

Josh

 

P.S. Can't donate money? Totally fine. Learn how you can Donate time

 

P.P.S. Please RSVP to show your support

 

Thank you again!
item.how_to_find_us: This is an online event. Please simply RSVP to show your support for our Doggy Fun Run!

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: IndieGoGo film to support our Doggy Fun Run
